name: Corpse Circle (Ludum Dare 52)
description:
You've lost your way to the heavens and are stuck in the fields of purgatory.

Cleanse your soul, grab the key of the gate and don't get caught.

[Note : the WebGL build is there for your convenience but does not include the visual effects. Please consider downloading the windows build to enjoy the work of the visual artists!]

Made for Ludum Dare 52

Credits :

[ 3D Art by Adrien Bouckaert & Louise "RocketSka" Jungers]

[2D Art by Louise "RocketSka" Jungers]

[Audio by Alexandre Meunier]

[Code by Jonathan Lorenz]
